title: Dazzling Diamond Kada - The Timeless Vanki Edition
materials: Ethically Sourced Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds. G-H Color
SI1-SI2 Clarity. Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: A pair of elegantly crafted bangles, designed in a contemporary 'Vanki' style, featuring a continuous string of round brilliant cut diamonds. Each diamond is meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize its brilliance and sparkle. The minimalist design allows the diamonds to take center stage. Flexible design for comfortable fit.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamond). The warm yellow gold provides a beautiful contrast to the dazzling white diamonds
occasions: and special celebrations. Its versatility also makes it suitable for upscale modern events and parties.
description: These bangles combine traditional elegance with modern sophistication. The high-quality diamonds are ethically sourced and hand-selected for their brilliance. The flexible design ensures a comfortable fit for a variety of wrist sizes. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. A timeless investment piece that will be cherished for generations.
